Introduction


Hi! Iâ€™m Robbie, a Data Professional passionate about using statistics for the right reasons. I have five years of experience in Data Analytics, Data Science, Research, and Statistician based work. On this website, you will find snippets of my past work, as well as more information about who I am :). If you have any questions, feel free to reach out!
